title: Colony Ascension
description: "The Tyrian female he was mating with cooed and groaned. While in the back of her mind she wondered about the light she’d seen. It hadn’t come from her planet."From the mind of Valjeanne Jeffers comes a tale that is truly out of this world. Born of the short stories Colony and Probe, the long awaited full novel Colony: Ascension has landed!The Earth is dying. Populations have been segregated into worthless and valuable populations. Wages buy only food and shelter, while the rich live like kings. Earth looks to the black abyss of space to save them. And the abyss looks back. Other species have their eyes on Earth, each with their own plans.Cover art and design by Quinton Veal.
author: Valjeanne Jeffers
